title: File Naming Patterns
description: Configure automatic file organization using metadata placeholders. Patterns are applied when uploading, moving files, or after metadata updates.

warning.title: Metadata Quality Notice:
warning.text: File naming relies entirely on metadata stored in Booklore. This feature is recommended only for high-quality, curated libraries with complete metadata.

defaultPattern.sectionDesc: Fallback pattern when no library-specific override is configured.
defaultPattern.saveSuccess: The default pattern was successfully saved!
defaultPattern.saveError: There was an error saving the settings.

libraryOverrides.sectionDesc: Define custom patterns for specific libraries. Leave empty to use the default pattern.
libraryOverrides.emptySubtitle: Create a library to configure custom naming patterns
libraryOverrides.placeholder: Leave empty to use default pattern

placeholders.sectionDesc: Use placeholders to dynamically insert metadata into file names and folder paths.
placeholders.title: Book title
placeholders.subtitle: Book subtitle
placeholders.optionalDesc: Wrap parts in angle brackets {{syntax}} to make them conditional. If any placeholder in the block has no value, the entire block is omitted.
placeholders.elseDesc: Add a fallback after a pipe | inside an optional block. If the primary side has missing values, the fallback is used instead.
placeholders.modifiersDesc: Append :modifier to a placeholder to transform its value. Example: {authors:sort}

examples.sectionDesc: Sample patterns with example metadata to help you understand how patterns work.
